Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Model: MPG Z490 GAMING PLUS


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1200
CPU Type: Supports 11th / 10th Gen Intel Core / Pentium Gold / Celeron processors

* Please go to intel.com for compatibility information.
* Onboard graphics output are disabled when using the F SKU processors.
* BIOS updated to be compatible with 11th Gen Intel Core Processors.


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel Z490


Onboard Video
Onboard Video Chipset: Supported only by CPU with integrated graphic


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR4)
Memory Standard: Supports 1R 2933 / 2666 / 2133 *

1DPC 1R Max speed up to 5000+
1DPC 2R Max speed up to 4500+
2DPC 1R Max speed up to 4400+
2DPC 2R Max speed up to 4000+

* Please refer www.msi.com for more information on compatible memory.
Maximum Memory Supported: 128GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 3.0 x16: 1 x PCIe 3.0 x16 slot (from CPU)*
1 x PCIe 3.0 x16 slot (from chipset, supports x4 mode)

* Actual support may vary by CPU.
PCI Express x1: 3 x PCI Express x1


Storage Devices
SATA 6Gb/s: 6 x SATA 6Gb/s

* SATA2 will be unavailable when installing M.2 SATA SSD in the M2_1 slot.
M.2: 2 x M.2 slots (Key M):

M2_1 slot:
CPU support mode (From 11th Gen Intel CPU only)- supports PCIe 4.0 x4/3.0 x4
Chipset support mode-supports PCIe 3.0 x4 and SATA 6Gb/s
Supports 2242/ 2260/ 2280/ 22110 storage devices*

M2_2 supports up to PCIe 3.0 x4 and SATA 6Gb/s, 2242/ 2260/ 2280 storage devices **

* SATA2 will be unavailable when installing M.2 SATA SSD in the M2_1 slot.
** SATA5 & SATA6 will be unavailable when installing M.2 SATA/PCIe SSD in the M2_2 slot.
Intel Optane Ready: Intel Optane Memory Ready *

* Before using Intel Optane memory modules, please ensure that you have updated the drivers and BIOS to the latest version from MSI website.
SATA RAID: 0/1/5/10


Onboard Audio
Audio Chipset: Realtek ALC1200-VD1 Codec
Audio Channels: 7.1 Channels


Onboard LAN
LAN Chipset: Realtek RTL8125B-CG
Max LAN Speed: 2.5Gbps


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 1 x DisplayPort
1 x HDMI
1 x LAN (RJ45)
1 x Optical S/PDIF Out
5 x Audio Jacks
1 x PS/2 Keyboard/Mouse Combo
1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A
1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C
2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A
2 x USB 2.0/1.1


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps Type-C port
2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps connectors (support additional 4 USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps ports)
2 x USB 2.0 connectors (support additional 4 USB 2.0 ports)
Other Connectors: 1 x 4-pin CPU fan connector
1 x 4-pin water pump connector
6 x 4-pin system fan connectors
1 x front panel audio connector
2 x system panel connectors
1 x Chassis Intrusion connector
1 x Clear CMOS jumper
1 x 4-pin RGB LED connector
2 x 3-pin RAINBOW LED connectors
1 x serial port connector
1 x TPM module connector
1 x TBT connector *

* Thunderbolt card need support RTD3.


Physical Spec
Form Factor: ATX
LED Lighting: RGB
Dimensions (W x L): 12.0" x 9.6"
Power Pin: 1 x 24-pin ATX main power connector
1 x 8-pin ATX 12V power connector
1 x 4-pin ATX 12V power connector


Windows Compatibility
Windows 11: Supported


Features
Features: Supports 10th Gen Intel Core, 11th Gen Intel Core, Pentium Gold and Celeron processors for LGA 1200 socket

Supports DDR4 Memory, up to 5000(OC) MHz

Ready 4 the Future: Support Lightning Gen 4 Solution for the future

Enhanced Power Design: 12+1+1 Duet Rail Power System, 8+4 pin CPU power connectors, Core Boost, DDR4 Boost

Premium Thermal Solution: Extended Heatsink Design and M.2 Shield Frozr are built for high performance system and non-stop gaming experience

2.5G LAN with LAN Manager: Upgraded network solution for professional and multimedia use. Delivers a secure, stable and fast network connection

Turbo M.2: Running at PCI-E Gen3 x4 maximizes performance for NVMe based SSDs

Pre-installed I/O Shielding: Better EMI protection and more convenience for installation

Intel Turbo USB 3.2 Gen 2: Powered by Intel USB 3.2 Gen 2 controller, Turbo USB ensures an uninterrupted connection with more stability and fastest USB speeds

Audio Boost: Reward your ears with studio grade sound quality
Label: Board MSI MPG Z490 Gaming Plus
